Class Schedule

1 Introduction to Computer Science slides, colab Create a basic program with variables.

3 Control Statements colab Rock, Paper, Scissors (at bottom of class colab file) Thanks again to Mick for being the only one to do his homework!
4 Conditional Statements colab Please finish Exercises 2-6 (from colab file). I will prioritize answering questions in class for people who did their homework. Thanks Mick for doing homework; your hard work is very much appreciated. @everyone else: just remember, you have the power the decide how much you want to learn.
